---
title: "Computing access"
---

We will use Positron as our IDE in this course.

-   Local install: <https://positron.posit.co>. You will also need to install R, and later in the course, Python.
    -   Download and install R 4.5.2: <https://cran.r-project.org/>
    -   Download and install Python 3.14.2: <https://www.python.org/downloads/>

-   Server access: Via departmental Posit workbench at <https://rstudio.stat.duke.edu>.
    -   Requires Duke Net ID log in.
    -   Also requires being on [Duke's VPN](https://oit.duke.edu/service/vpn/) if not on the campus network.
